Html:
A few things I'd like to bring up about the newly added bear threat section of rawr.bear.
First, is it possible to model the expertise proc from the shattered sun neck for scryers?
Second, is it possible to model lacerate spam vs swipe spam vs lacerate, swipe x2 to see which one would give more threat based on current gear and buffs?
Finally, either this is a bug or not implemented yet, in Rawr 14, the threat module doesn't seem to take into consideration 4 piece t6 for threat.
Thanks for a great program.
Currently it only includes lacerate spam. We're working on the other attack patterns for a future release. The expertise proc from the SSO neck is included in b14.1
The buff is there for 4t6, but since swipe isn't used in the rotation, it has no value.
